data.title: Village Apartments of Summitville
data.meta_description: Newly renovated 1 and 2-bedroom apartments located in Summitville, Indiana offering spacious floor plans, walk-in closets, and new appliances.
data.text:
1100 West Mill Street | Summitville, IN 46070

Phone: (765)675-4615

Newly renovated 1 and 2-bedroom apartments located in Summitville, Indiana. These traditional 2-story, brick buildings offer spacious floor plans, walk-in closets, and new appliances. They have an off-street parking area and an on-site laundry facility. If you are looking for a 1 or 2-bedroom apartment home, look no further we have just what you are looking for.

1-2
